venue.name: Saint Anselm College - New Hampshire Institute of Politics

item.description:
AFP-NH is proud to be one of the sponsors of an upcoming panel discussion entitled: "GOP Primary Debate Kick-Off Luncheon: Turns-On and Turns-Off for Conservative Voters."

The panel discussion will take place on Monday, June 13 from 12:30PM to 1:30PM in the Auditorium at The New Hampshire Institute of Politics at Saint Anselm College. The event is also being sponsored by the Heritage Foundation and the Josiah Bartlett Center for Public Policy. The event will be moderated by CNN Correspondent Tim Foreman and the panelists will include Charles Arlinghaus, President, Josiah Bartlett Center; Mike Franc, Vice President of Government Studies, The Heritage Foundation; and myself.

To register for what promises to be an engaging and informative discussion, please use THIS LINK ( https://spreadsheets.... ). I am excited to be a part of this event and hope to see you there!

Sincerely,

Corey R. Lewandowski
State Director
Americans for Prosperity New Hampshire

http://www.facebook.c...
item.name: Pre-Debate Panel Discussion / Luncheon
